title: 07/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Vince Goodwill
itunes:title: 07/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Vince Goodwill
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan, discuss the biggest story in sports media and break down why a dispute at a major sports network is taking place. Yahoo Sports NBA Writer Vince Goodwill joins the guys to react to Game 1 of the NBA Finals and debate if the Suns truly deserve this opportunity at a title. Plus, Sha'Carri Richardson will now miss the Olympics entirely, but is the American team making a huge mistake?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
